metadata.source_file: dao\正统道藏洞真部\灵图类\三才定位图.txt

full_translation:
**Chart of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions**

*Scripture Title:* *Chart of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions*. Presented to the imperial court by Zhang Shangying of the Song Dynasty. Two texts in one scroll. Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, *Lingtu* Category.

**Chapter Titles of the *Chart of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions***

Presented by Zhang Shangying, Grand Master for Thorough Service, Guardian of the Right Vice Director of the Department of State Affairs, Concurrently Palace Attendant of the Secretariat, Grand Pillar of the State, Duke of the Principality of Qinghe, with a fief of 2,900 households and an actual enfeoffment of 900 households.

**Upper Chapter**
The *Spiritual Pivot* states: The summit of Kunlun Mountain is called Jade Capital Mountain. The Jade Capital Heavenly Thearch rules as the One of Heaven, surrounded by thirty-two Heavenly Thearchs in the four directions—altogether thirty-three Thearchs, which the Grand Historian referred to as the concealment of the sun and moon to form day and night.

The palace where the Jade Capital Heavenly Thearch resides, the *Biography of the Brilliant Sage* calls the Hall of Pervading Radiance, where the Thearch’s bodily light and the hall’s light illuminate each other.

The *Spiritual Pivot* states: Above the Jade Capital Heaven are the Three Pure Heavens.
The Grand Clarity Heaven, also called the Great Scarlet Heaven.
*Liezi* also says: "Looking up, one sees neither sun nor moon; looking down, one sees neither rivers nor seas." This describes this heaven.

The Highest Clarity Heaven, also called the Yu-Yu Heaven.
The Jade Clarity Heaven, also called the Qingwei Heaven. Here, the Nine August Ones descend with *qi*, initiating yin and yang, manifesting divine transformations, and bestowing joy upon self and others—this is this heaven.

The Heaven of the Void Thearch: This is where the True Nine August Ones descend with *qi* from above, and the wind below moistens the marsh to create the world. As *qi* possesses yin and yang, so people possess male and female, which the *Cavern Scripture* calls Jade Lads and Jade Maidens. This is why I have arranged the Three Pure Heavens as follows: Jade Clarity as the Qingwei Heaven, Highest Clarity as the Yu-Yu Heaven, and Grand Clarity as the Great Scarlet Heaven.

**Lower Chapter**
The eight trigrams of the *Book of Changes* originate from the *qi* of the True Nine August Ones. Pure yang is *Qian*, residing in the northwest; pure yin is *Kun*, residing in the southwest. When the yang of *Qian* descends and seizes the yin within *Kun*, the center of *Kan* becomes solid and forms the moon. When the yin of *Kun* ascends and seizes the yang within *Qian*, the center of *Li* becomes hollow and forms the sun.

The moon receives the *qi* of the sun and moves through the twelve earthly branches. At the new moon, it is the body of *Kun*; at the full moon, it is the body of *Qian*. From the third to the seventh day, it emerges at *Geng* as *Zhen*; from the eighth to the twelfth day, it emerges at *Ding* as *Dui*; from the thirteenth to the seventeenth day, it emerges at *Jia* as *Qian*; from the eighteenth to the twenty-second day, it emerges at *Xin* as *Xun*; from the twenty-third to the twenty-seventh day, it emerges at *Wu* as *Gen*; from the twenty-eighth to the second day, it sets at *Yi* as *Kun*. Thus, five days make one *hou*, three *hou* make one *qi*, and the divisions of solstices, equinoxes, beginnings, and closings are thereby precise to the finest measure.

Among the sixty-four hexagrams of the *Book of Changes*, *Li* is fire and lightning, *Kan* is water and clouds, yet they do not represent the sun and moon. For the sun and moon transform *Qian*, *Kun*, *Zhen*, *Dui*, *Gen*, and *Xun* to complete the years, months, days, and hours. If they were confined to the images, their transformations would be hindered. The Han Confucians’ designation of the four cardinal trigrams as the lords of the directions and the six children as the functions of *Qian* and *Kun* are all conjectural theories.

The Three August Ones, the Five Thearchs, and Confucius used this to exhaust principle, fulfill nature, and attain destiny. If one does not unite with the spirit but relies on intellect, is this not what is meant by "beyond this, there is nothing to be known"?

**Heaven of the Void Thearch**
True Nine August Ones, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Elder, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Emperor, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Honored One, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Lord.

**Jade Clarity Heaven**
Heavenly Treasure Lord of the Jade Clarity Qingwei Heaven, Supreme Lord of the Purple Dao and Void, Great Supreme Dao Lord of the Winged Sun and Void, Primordial Lord of the Prosperous Yang and Void, Supreme Lord of the Sevenfold Stillness and Dao-Generated Void, Cavern Clarity Lord of the Great Brightness and Void, Great Empyrean Lord of the Primordial Void, Golden Spirit Lord of the Sevenfold Observance and Void-Generated, Radiant Lord of the Eightfold High Mystery and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Purple Radiance and Jade Clarity, Purple Void Supreme Realized King of the Nine Empyreans, Cavern Void Lord of the Three Origins and Great Brightness, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Simplicity and High Void, Purple Orchid Lord of the Void Brightness and Central Origin, Supreme Dao Lord of the Eastern Brilliance and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Western Florescence and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Southern Vermilion and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Northern Perfection and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Central Origin and Void Union, Supreme Dao Lord of the Five Spirits and Sevenfold Brightness, Intermingled Generation.

True Elder of the Three Origins and Supreme Void, True Lord of the Three Origins and Four Poles, Supreme Void, Primordial Spirit Lord of the Three Origins and Central Yellow Radiance, Primordial Womb Lord of the Three Origins and Purple Radiance.

Supreme Lord of the Void, Jade Lord of the Supreme Void, Jade Emperor Lord of the August Supreme, Cavern Perfected Lord of the August Clarity, Supreme Lord of the Great Simplicity, Supreme Thearch of the Purple Void and August Supreme, Lord of the Myriad Beginnings and August Supreme, Purple Dawn Lord, Supreme Thearch of the Purple Void and Ancient Emperor, Azure Spirit Lord of the Yang Peace, True Lord of the Void and Great Perfection, Cavern Radiance Lord, Nonpareil Central Perfected Ancient Lord.

**Highest Clarity Heaven**
Numinous Treasure Lord of the Highest Clarity Yu-Yu Heaven, Supreme Dao Lord of the Three Origins and Purple Clarity, Cavern Radiance, Great Simplicity, Purple Dawn Lord of the Supreme Subtlety, Heavenly Emperor Dao Lord, Central Perfected Lord of the Four Dipper and Seven Dawns, Scattered Blossoms, Purple Void Lord of the Three Origins and Purple Essence, True Lord of the Nine Origins and Supreme Void, Supreme Clarity Lord of the Threefold Purple Essence, Supreme Lord of the Great Void and Empyrean Flight, Central Yellow Elder Dao Lord, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Origin and Eastern Radiance, Fusang Vermilion Forest, Great Emperor of the Cinnabar Grove, Golden Watchtower Lord of the Posterior Sage and Great Peace, Li Perfected Heavenly Emperor, Supreme Lord of the Great Void and Posterior Sage, Primordial Radiance, Peng Palace Perfected Lord, Eastern Florescence Lord of the Square Reservoir Palace, Supreme Dawn Master, Jade Guardian King, Azure Lad Dao Lord, Supreme Lord of the Great Void and Dawn Center, Lord of the Central Cavern of Mount Emei, Jade Portal Lord of the Great Simplicity, Purple Void Jade Emperor, Purple Dawn Lord, Supreme Lord of the Great Brightness and Central Perfected, Nonpareil Lord, Nine August Supreme Perfected Lord of Life.

Eastern Supreme Origin Lesser Yang Azure Sovereign, Southern Pervading Yang Absorbing Yin Cinnabar Emperor, Western Lesser Yin Metallic White Emperor, Northern Pervading Yin Supreme Yang Black Emperor. Central Unifying Spirit Supreme August Yellow Emperor.

Grand Clarity Heaven, Great Vermilion Grand Clarity Heaven’s Divine Treasure Lord; True Yang Primordial Elder Perfected Unity Dao Lord; Supreme Ultimate Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord; Grand Clarity Great Dao Lord; August Four Elders Central Dao Lord; August Primordial Purple Spirit Primordial Lord; Supreme Origin Ninefold Simplicity Golden Florescence Radiance Primordial Lord; Primordial Void Yellow Chamber Perfected Dawn Lord; Azure Essence Supreme Perfected Inner Radiance Lord; Heavenly August Supreme Perfected Jade Florescence Threefold Primordial Lord; Perfected Continent Two Masters Nine Perfected Earls Supreme Thearch Controllers of Prohibitions; Supreme Ultimate Lords of the Four Perfected; Dawn Center Yellow Radiance Primordial Lord; Supreme Clarity Eight August Elders Lord; Grotto Clarity Lesser Existence Jade Perfected Myriad Florescence Master of Charts Jade Lord; Supreme Unity Supreme Origin Prohibition Lord; Supreme Yang Ninefold Black Jade Worthies Primordial Lord; Supreme Perfected Capital Ninefold Black Venerable Master of Immortals; Western Origin Turtle Mountain Ninefold Numinous Perfected Immortal Mother Azure-Golden Elixir August Lord.

The Eight Trigrams Descend in Darkness
The Dao speaks: Prior to the Supreme Unity, its form was spontaneous.

The Supreme Unity is the primordial qi of the Original One, first born within the Great Void. It resides within the boundless and infinite, dwelling at the inception of formlessness and imagelessness—hence it is called the Supreme Unity. Above is wind, below is water; these two qi intermingle and settle. Above the Great Void lies the Heaven of Jade Capital, which is Jade Capital Mountain. The "contained lotus" refers to the qi of the Six Origins, which, moved by the numinous spirits of the Nine August Celestial Perfected, descend to divide the semblance of primordial chaos. At the first flourishing, transformation begins, and the uncarved simplicity arranges itself into the wheel of wind and water; at the second flourishing, the qi intermingle and settle.

Above Jade Capital, to the east, south, west, and north, lie eight heavens each—thirty-two heavens in total, with one hundred and twenty-two Thearchs. Above Jade Capital lies the Three Clarities Heaven, which comprises the Heaven of Jade Clarity’s Sacred Realm, the Heaven of Highest Clarity’s Perfected Realm, and the Heaven of Supreme Clarity’s Immortal Realm. Above the Three Clarities Heaven lie the Ten Heavens of the Void August, wherein dwell the Void August Primordial Elders, Void August Primordial Lords, Void August Primordial Thearchs, Void August Primordial Venerables, and the Celestial Perfected Nine August Realized Ones.

The Celestial Perfected August Ones descend the Nine Flourishings of Celestial Perfection, dividing the Six Origins to form the semblance of primordial chaos. Lesser Yang corresponds to Qian, its emblem being metal; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the first flourishing of the Golden Perfected, born within water, its form like playful medicine. Its semblance transforms: above, red; below, black; left, azure; right, white; and at its center, yellow. It revolves within, concealing this qi. Lesser Yin corresponds to Xun, its emblem being wood; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the second flourishing of the Wooden Perfected, born within wind, its form like playful medicine. Its semblance transforms: above, black; below, red; left, white; right, azure; and at its center, yellow. It revolves within, concealing this flourishing.

Greater Yin corresponds to Kan, its emblem being the virtue of water reversing fire; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the third flourishing of the Water Virtue Fire Perfected, born within water, its form like an embraced egg. Greater Yang corresponds to Li, its emblem being the virtue of fire reversing water; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the fourth flourishing of the Fire Virtue Water Perfected, born within wind, its form like an embraced egg. Yang Brightness corresponds to Zhen, its emblem being wood; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the fifth flourishing of the Wooden Perfected, born within water, its form like a contained lotus. Greater Yin corresponds to Dui, its emblem being metal; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the sixth flourishing of the Golden Perfected, born within wind, its form like a contained lotus.

The Three Yangs converge at Gen, its emblem being earth; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the seventh flourishing of the Earth Perfected, moved by earth to be born in the upper expanse. It scatters and transforms into heaven—thus pure yang becomes heaven, while the remaining flourishings scatter and transform into the sun, moon, and stars. The Three Yins converge at Kun, its emblem being earth; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the eighth flourishing of the Earth Perfected, moved by earth to open below. It scatters and transforms into earth—thus turbid yin becomes earth, while the remaining flourishings fuse and congeal into mountains, rivers, metals, and stones, thereby manifesting the true Dao of spontaneity.

Jade Capital Heaven and Jade Capital Mountain’s Luminous Hall:
August Jade Thearch of the Vast Heaven, the Memorial-Presenting Youth;
Eight Heavens of the East, Eight Heavens of the South, Eight Heavens of the West, Eight Heavens of the North.
The Gate of Change:
Generals Tang, Ge, and Zhou; the Communicating Perfected Envoys lead the way, as Perfected Zhang receives the memorial, and the Memorial Youth presents the document.
Marshal Tianpeng the Great, Marshal Tianyou the Great, Perfected Lord of Protective Virtue and Numinous Response, and Perfected Lord of Numinous Might and Protective Sagacity.
Heavenly Kings of the East, South, West, and North.

Purple Tenuity Enclosure:
Great Thearch of the Heavenly August, Purple Tenuity Thearch Lord;
Lords of the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper;
Thearch Lord of the Great Yang, Thearch Lord of the Great Yin, Star Lords of Wood Virtue, Fire Virtue, Metal Virtue, Water Virtue, Earth Virtue, Rāhu, Ketu, Purple Qi, and Comet;
Star Lords of the Seven Mansions of the East, Seven Mansions of the South, Seven Mansions of the West, and Seven Mansions of the North.

Six Palaces of Fengdu:
Palace of Yin’s Utter Extinction, Palace of Grand Slaughter and Solemn Affairs, Palace of Bright Dawn and Enduring Offenses, Palace of Serene Illumination and Sinister Darkness, Palace of the Sevenfold Transgressions of the Ancestral Numen, Palace of Daring Governance and Repeated Offenses.

Diagram of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions:
Above the Three Clarities Heaven lie the Ten Heavens of the Void August, wherein dwell the Void August Primordial Elders, Void August Primordial Lords, Void August Primordial Thearchs, Void August Primordial Venerables, and the Celestial Perfected Nine August Ones.

Three Heavens of the Void August:
First revolution: red; second: yellow; third: white; fourth: azure;
Fifth: black; sixth: red; seventh: azure; eighth: white; ninth: yellow.
The Heavenly Venerable’s head is azure, the sash behind is the same.
Void August Primordial Venerable,
Void August Primordial Elders.

The Nine Celestial Perfected August Ones

chunks.original_text: 三才定位图 经名：三才定位图。 宋账商英进於朝。 二书同卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部灵图类。 三才定位图篇目 通奉大夫守尚书右仆射兼中书侍郎上柱国清河郡开国公食邑二千九百户食实封九百户张商英　进 上篇 《灵枢经》日：昆仑山之顶曰玉京山，玉京天一帝，四方各八天帝，凡三十三帝，太史公所谓日月隐蔽以为昼夜者也。 玉京天帝所居之殿，《斓圣传》谓之通明殿，以帝之身光与殿光相照。 《灵枢经》日：玉京天之上有三清天。 泰清天，又谓之大赤天。 《列子》亦日：仰不见日月，俯不见河海。 盖此天也。 上清天，又日禹余天，玉清天，又日清微天，盖九皇降气，肇有阴阳，神通变化，物我受乐，即此天也。 虚皇天者，此天真九皇所以降气於上，风下泽而造世界也。 气有阴阳则人有男女，《洞经》谓之玉童玉女。 此臣所以列三清所居玉清为清微天，上清为禹余天，泰清为大赤天也。 下篇 《易》之八卦，盖祖乎天真九皇之气也。 纯阳为乾而居西北，纯阴为坤而居西南。 乾阳下降而夺坤中之阴，故坎中实而为月也，坤阴上升而夺乾中之阳，故高中虚而为日也。 月也者，受日之气而行於十二辰者也，晦则为坤体，望则为乾体，三日至七日出於庚而为震，八日至十二日出於丁而为兑，十三至十七日出於甲而为乾，十八至二十二日出於辛而为巽，二十三至二十七日出於戊而为艮，二十八至初二日没於乙而为坤。 是故五日为一候，三候为一气，而分至启闭，於是乎不差抄忽。 其在《易》之六十四象，高为火，为电，坎为水，为云，而不曰日月，盖日月者，变乾、坤、震、兑、艮、巽以成岁月日时者也，入於象则滞於变矣。 汉儒乃以四正为方伯卦，又以六子为乾坤之用，皆臆说也。 三皇、五帝、仲尼以此穷理，以此尽性，而至於命。 若夫不以神会而以智知，岂非所谓过此以往，未之或知者哉？ 虚皇天 天真九皇、虚皇玄老、虚皇玄帝、虚皇玄尊、虚皇玄君。 玉清天 清微玉清天帝天宝君，紫道虚皇上君、翼日虚皇太上道君、昌阳始虚高皇元君、七静道生高上虚皇君、太明虚皇洞清君、始玄虚皇大霄君、七观玄生虚皇金灵君、八观高玄虚皇停景君、紫晖太上玉皇明上大道君、上虚紫映九霄真王紫虚高上玄皇道君、洞虚三元太明上皇道君、太素高虚上极紫皇道君、虚明紫兰中元高上婷皇道君。 东明高上虚皇道君、西华高上虚皇道君、南朱高上虚皇道君、北真高上虚皇道君、中元上合虚皇道君、五灵七明混生高上道君。 三元无上真老虚皇元晨君、三元四极真上虚皇元灵君、三元晨中黄景虚皇元台君、三元紫映晖神虚生真元胎君。 高上虚皇君、上皇玉虚君、皇上玉帝君、皇清洞真君、高上太素君、紫虚皇上太帝皇上万始先生上皇先生紫晨君、紫虚皇老上帝君、青灵阳安元君、真虚太真洞景君、无英中真上老君。 上清天 禹余上清天灵宝君，紫清太素高虚洞曜三元道君、紫晨太微天帝道君、四斗中真七晨散华君、紫虚三元紫精君、真寂九元上虚皇君、上清紫精三素君、太虚上霄飞晨中央黄老道君、太元东霞搏桑丹林大帝上道君、金阙后圣太平李真天帝上景君、太虚后圣元景彭室真君、东华方诸宫高晨师玉保王青童道君、太无晨中君、刊峨眉山中洞宫玉户太素君、紫虚玉皇先生紫晨君、太明灵辉中真无上君、九皇上真司命君。
chunks.translated_text:
**Chart of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions**

*Scripture Title:* *Chart of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions*. Presented to the imperial court by Zhang Shangying of the Song Dynasty. Two texts in one scroll. Source text: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Dongzhen* Section, *Lingtu* Category.

**Chapter Titles of the *Chart of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions***

Presented by Zhang Shangying, Grand Master for Thorough Service, Guardian of the Right Vice Director of the Department of State Affairs, Concurrently Palace Attendant of the Secretariat, Grand Pillar of the State, Duke of the Principality of Qinghe, with a fief of 2,900 households and an actual enfeoffment of 900 households.

**Upper Chapter**
The *Spiritual Pivot* states: The summit of Kunlun Mountain is called Jade Capital Mountain. The Jade Capital Heavenly Thearch rules as the One of Heaven, surrounded by thirty-two Heavenly Thearchs in the four directions—altogether thirty-three Thearchs, which the Grand Historian referred to as the concealment of the sun and moon to form day and night.

The palace where the Jade Capital Heavenly Thearch resides, the *Biography of the Brilliant Sage* calls the Hall of Pervading Radiance, where the Thearch’s bodily light and the hall’s light illuminate each other.

The *Spiritual Pivot* states: Above the Jade Capital Heaven are the Three Pure Heavens.
The Grand Clarity Heaven, also called the Great Scarlet Heaven.
*Liezi* also says: "Looking up, one sees neither sun nor moon; looking down, one sees neither rivers nor seas." This describes this heaven.

The Highest Clarity Heaven, also called the Yu-Yu Heaven.
The Jade Clarity Heaven, also called the Qingwei Heaven. Here, the Nine August Ones descend with *qi*, initiating yin and yang, manifesting divine transformations, and bestowing joy upon self and others—this is this heaven.

The Heaven of the Void Thearch: This is where the True Nine August Ones descend with *qi* from above, and the wind below moistens the marsh to create the world. As *qi* possesses yin and yang, so people possess male and female, which the *Cavern Scripture* calls Jade Lads and Jade Maidens. This is why I have arranged the Three Pure Heavens as follows: Jade Clarity as the Qingwei Heaven, Highest Clarity as the Yu-Yu Heaven, and Grand Clarity as the Great Scarlet Heaven.

**Lower Chapter**
The eight trigrams of the *Book of Changes* originate from the *qi* of the True Nine August Ones. Pure yang is *Qian*, residing in the northwest; pure yin is *Kun*, residing in the southwest. When the yang of *Qian* descends and seizes the yin within *Kun*, the center of *Kan* becomes solid and forms the moon. When the yin of *Kun* ascends and seizes the yang within *Qian*, the center of *Li* becomes hollow and forms the sun.

The moon receives the *qi* of the sun and moves through the twelve earthly branches. At the new moon, it is the body of *Kun*; at the full moon, it is the body of *Qian*. From the third to the seventh day, it emerges at *Geng* as *Zhen*; from the eighth to the twelfth day, it emerges at *Ding* as *Dui*; from the thirteenth to the seventeenth day, it emerges at *Jia* as *Qian*; from the eighteenth to the twenty-second day, it emerges at *Xin* as *Xun*; from the twenty-third to the twenty-seventh day, it emerges at *Wu* as *Gen*; from the twenty-eighth to the second day, it sets at *Yi* as *Kun*. Thus, five days make one *hou*, three *hou* make one *qi*, and the divisions of solstices, equinoxes, beginnings, and closings are thereby precise to the finest measure.

Among the sixty-four hexagrams of the *Book of Changes*, *Li* is fire and lightning, *Kan* is water and clouds, yet they do not represent the sun and moon. For the sun and moon transform *Qian*, *Kun*, *Zhen*, *Dui*, *Gen*, and *Xun* to complete the years, months, days, and hours. If they were confined to the images, their transformations would be hindered. The Han Confucians’ designation of the four cardinal trigrams as the lords of the directions and the six children as the functions of *Qian* and *Kun* are all conjectural theories.

The Three August Ones, the Five Thearchs, and Confucius used this to exhaust principle, fulfill nature, and attain destiny. If one does not unite with the spirit but relies on intellect, is this not what is meant by "beyond this, there is nothing to be known"?

**Heaven of the Void Thearch**
True Nine August Ones, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Elder, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Emperor, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Honored One, Void Thearch of the Mysterious Lord.

**Jade Clarity Heaven**
Heavenly Treasure Lord of the Jade Clarity Qingwei Heaven, Supreme Lord of the Purple Dao and Void, Great Supreme Dao Lord of the Winged Sun and Void, Primordial Lord of the Prosperous Yang and Void, Supreme Lord of the Sevenfold Stillness and Dao-Generated Void, Cavern Clarity Lord of the Great Brightness and Void, Great Empyrean Lord of the Primordial Void, Golden Spirit Lord of the Sevenfold Observance and Void-Generated, Radiant Lord of the Eightfold High Mystery and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Purple Radiance and Jade Clarity, Purple Void Supreme Realized King of the Nine Empyreans, Cavern Void Lord of the Three Origins and Great Brightness, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Simplicity and High Void, Purple Orchid Lord of the Void Brightness and Central Origin, Supreme Dao Lord of the Eastern Brilliance and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Western Florescence and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Southern Vermilion and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Northern Perfection and Void, Supreme Dao Lord of the Central Origin and Void Union, Supreme Dao Lord of the Five Spirits and Sevenfold Brightness, Intermingled Generation.

True Elder of the Three Origins and Supreme Void, True Lord of the Three Origins and Four Poles, Supreme Void, Primordial Spirit Lord of the Three Origins and Central Yellow Radiance, Primordial Womb Lord of the Three Origins and Purple Radiance.

Supreme Lord of the Void, Jade Lord of the Supreme Void, Jade Emperor Lord of the August Supreme, Cavern Perfected Lord of the August Clarity, Supreme Lord of the Great Simplicity, Supreme Thearch of the Purple Void and August Supreme, Lord of the Myriad Beginnings and August Supreme, Purple Dawn Lord, Supreme Thearch of the Purple Void and Ancient Emperor, Azure Spirit Lord of the Yang Peace, True Lord of the Void and Great Perfection, Cavern Radiance Lord, Nonpareil Central Perfected Ancient Lord.

**Highest Clarity Heaven**
Numinous Treasure Lord of the Highest Clarity Yu-Yu Heaven, Supreme Dao Lord of the Three Origins and Purple Clarity, Cavern Radiance, Great Simplicity, Purple Dawn Lord of the Supreme Subtlety, Heavenly Emperor Dao Lord, Central Perfected Lord of the Four Dipper and Seven Dawns, Scattered Blossoms, Purple Void Lord of the Three Origins and Purple Essence, True Lord of the Nine Origins and Supreme Void, Supreme Clarity Lord of the Threefold Purple Essence, Supreme Lord of the Great Void and Empyrean Flight, Central Yellow Elder Dao Lord, Supreme Dao Lord of the Great Origin and Eastern Radiance, Fusang Vermilion Forest, Great Emperor of the Cinnabar Grove, Golden Watchtower Lord of the Posterior Sage and Great Peace, Li Perfected Heavenly Emperor, Supreme Lord of the Great Void and Posterior Sage, Primordial Radiance, Peng Palace Perfected Lord, Eastern Florescence Lord of the Square Reservoir Palace, Supreme Dawn Master, Jade Guardian King, Azure Lad Dao Lord, Supreme Lord of the Great Void and Dawn Center, Lord of the Central Cavern of Mount Emei, Jade Portal Lord of the Great Simplicity, Purple Void Jade Emperor, Purple Dawn Lord, Supreme Lord of the Great Brightness and Central Perfected, Nonpareil Lord, Nine August Supreme Perfected Lord of Life.

chunks.original_text: 东方上始少阳青州、南方通阳纳阴赤帝、西方少阴西金白帝、北方通阴太阳黑帝。 中央总灵高皇黄帝。 泰清天 大赤泰清天神宝君，真阳元老真一道君、太极大道元景君、泰清大道君、皇上四老道中君、皇初紫灵元君、太初九素金华景元君、元虚黄房真晨君、青精上真内景君、天皇上真玉华三元君、真洲二士九真伯上帝司禁君、太极主四真人元君、晨中黄景元君、上清八皇老君、洞清小有玉真万华先生主图玉君、太一上元禁君、太阳九黑玉贤元君、太真都九黑丈人主仙君、西元龟山九灵真仙母青金丹皇君。 八卦降黑 道言太一之先，其形自然。
chunks.translated_text:
Eastern Supreme Origin Lesser Yang Azure Sovereign, Southern Pervading Yang Absorbing Yin Cinnabar Emperor, Western Lesser Yin Metallic White Emperor, Northern Pervading Yin Supreme Yang Black Emperor. Central Unifying Spirit Supreme August Yellow Emperor.

Grand Clarity Heaven, Great Vermilion Grand Clarity Heaven’s Divine Treasure Lord; True Yang Primordial Elder Perfected Unity Dao Lord; Supreme Ultimate Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord; Grand Clarity Great Dao Lord; August Four Elders Central Dao Lord; August Primordial Purple Spirit Primordial Lord; Supreme Origin Ninefold Simplicity Golden Florescence Radiance Primordial Lord; Primordial Void Yellow Chamber Perfected Dawn Lord; Azure Essence Supreme Perfected Inner Radiance Lord; Heavenly August Supreme Perfected Jade Florescence Threefold Primordial Lord; Perfected Continent Two Masters Nine Perfected Earls Supreme Thearch Controllers of Prohibitions; Supreme Ultimate Lords of the Four Perfected; Dawn Center Yellow Radiance Primordial Lord; Supreme Clarity Eight August Elders Lord; Grotto Clarity Lesser Existence Jade Perfected Myriad Florescence Master of Charts Jade Lord; Supreme Unity Supreme Origin Prohibition Lord; Supreme Yang Ninefold Black Jade Worthies Primordial Lord; Supreme Perfected Capital Ninefold Black Venerable Master of Immortals; Western Origin Turtle Mountain Ninefold Numinous Perfected Immortal Mother Azure-Golden Elixir August Lord.

The Eight Trigrams Descend in Darkness
The Dao speaks: Prior to the Supreme Unity, its form was spontaneous.

chunks.original_text: 太一者，元一之气，始生於太虚之中也。 在无极无穷之内，居无形无象之初，故日太一者也。 上日风，下日水，二气停泽也。 太虚之上有玉京之天，乃玉京山也。 含莲谓六元之气，感天真九皇之神而降分混沌之象，一熙始化，列朴而成风水之轮，二熙停泽。 玉京之上，东南西北各有八天，三十二天，一二十二帝也。 玉京之上有三清之天者，乃玉清圣境，上清真境，太清仙境之天。 三清之天上有虚皇十天，其间乃虚皇元老、虚皇元君、虚皇元帝、虚皇元尊与天真九皇真人而居其中。 天真皇人降天真九熙，分六元，为混沌之象也。 少阳应乾，其象曰金，降天真九皇金真之一黑而生水中，状如戏药，变其象，上赤下黑，左青右白，其中央黄，运之中而藏是气也。 少阴应巽，其象日木，降天真九皇木真之二熙而生风中，状如戏药，变其象，上黑下赤，左白右青，其中央黄，运之中而藏是熙也。 太阴应坎，其象日水德反火，降天真九皇水德火真之三熙而生水中，状如抱卯。 太阳应离，其象日火德反水，降天真九皇火德水真之四熙而生风中，状如抱卵。 阳明应震，其象日木，降天真九皇木真之五熙而生水中，状如含莲。 厥阴应兑，其象日金，降天真九皇金真之六熙而生风中，状如含莲。 三阳会艮，其象日土，降天真九皇土真之七熙感土而生上廓，散易为天，故清阳为天，余熙散化成日月星辰也。 三阴会坤，其象日土，降天真九皇土真之八熙感土而下开，散易为地，故浊阴为地，余熙融结为山川金石，始出自然之正道也。 玉京天玉京山通明殿 昊天玉皇上帝、进章童子，东方八天，南方八天，西方八天，北方八天。 易有之门 唐将军、葛将军、周将军，通真使者引进，张真人受章，章子奏书。 天蓬大元帅、天猷大元帅、栩圣保德真君、佑圣真武灵应真君。 东方天王、南方天王、西方天王、北方天王。 紫微垣 天皇大帝紫微帝君、北斗七星君。 太阳帝君、太阴帝君、木德星君、火德星君、金德星君、水德星君、土德星君、罗喉星君、计都星君、紫气星君、 月孛星君。 东方七宿星君、南方七宿星君、西方七宿星君、北方七宿星君。 邓都六宫 纣绝阴天宫、泰煞谅事宗天宫、明晨耐犯武城天宫、恬照罪黑天宫、宗灵七非天宫、敢司连宛屡天宫。 三才定位图 三清之天，上有虚皇十天，其问乃虚皇元老、虚皇元君、虚皇元帝、虚皇元尊与天直（九皇而居其中焉。 虚皇三天 外一运红二黄三白四青 五黑六红七青八白九黄 天尊头青绿带后并同 虚皇元尊 虚皇元老
chunks.translated_text:
The Supreme Unity is the primordial qi of the Original One, first born within the Great Void. It resides within the boundless and infinite, dwelling at the inception of formlessness and imagelessness—hence it is called the Supreme Unity. Above is wind, below is water; these two qi intermingle and settle. Above the Great Void lies the Heaven of Jade Capital, which is Jade Capital Mountain. The "contained lotus" refers to the qi of the Six Origins, which, moved by the numinous spirits of the Nine August Celestial Perfected, descend to divide the semblance of primordial chaos. At the first flourishing, transformation begins, and the uncarved simplicity arranges itself into the wheel of wind and water; at the second flourishing, the qi intermingle and settle.

Above Jade Capital, to the east, south, west, and north, lie eight heavens each—thirty-two heavens in total, with one hundred and twenty-two Thearchs. Above Jade Capital lies the Three Clarities Heaven, which comprises the Heaven of Jade Clarity’s Sacred Realm, the Heaven of Highest Clarity’s Perfected Realm, and the Heaven of Supreme Clarity’s Immortal Realm. Above the Three Clarities Heaven lie the Ten Heavens of the Void August, wherein dwell the Void August Primordial Elders, Void August Primordial Lords, Void August Primordial Thearchs, Void August Primordial Venerables, and the Celestial Perfected Nine August Realized Ones.

The Celestial Perfected August Ones descend the Nine Flourishings of Celestial Perfection, dividing the Six Origins to form the semblance of primordial chaos. Lesser Yang corresponds to Qian, its emblem being metal; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the first flourishing of the Golden Perfected, born within water, its form like playful medicine. Its semblance transforms: above, red; below, black; left, azure; right, white; and at its center, yellow. It revolves within, concealing this qi. Lesser Yin corresponds to Xun, its emblem being wood; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the second flourishing of the Wooden Perfected, born within wind, its form like playful medicine. Its semblance transforms: above, black; below, red; left, white; right, azure; and at its center, yellow. It revolves within, concealing this flourishing.

Greater Yin corresponds to Kan, its emblem being the virtue of water reversing fire; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the third flourishing of the Water Virtue Fire Perfected, born within water, its form like an embraced egg. Greater Yang corresponds to Li, its emblem being the virtue of fire reversing water; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the fourth flourishing of the Fire Virtue Water Perfected, born within wind, its form like an embraced egg. Yang Brightness corresponds to Zhen, its emblem being wood; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the fifth flourishing of the Wooden Perfected, born within water, its form like a contained lotus. Greater Yin corresponds to Dui, its emblem being metal; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the sixth flourishing of the Golden Perfected, born within wind, its form like a contained lotus.

The Three Yangs converge at Gen, its emblem being earth; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the seventh flourishing of the Earth Perfected, moved by earth to be born in the upper expanse. It scatters and transforms into heaven—thus pure yang becomes heaven, while the remaining flourishings scatter and transform into the sun, moon, and stars. The Three Yins converge at Kun, its emblem being earth; the Nine August Celestial Perfected descend the eighth flourishing of the Earth Perfected, moved by earth to open below. It scatters and transforms into earth—thus turbid yin becomes earth, while the remaining flourishings fuse and congeal into mountains, rivers, metals, and stones, thereby manifesting the true Dao of spontaneity.

Jade Capital Heaven and Jade Capital Mountain’s Luminous Hall:
August Jade Thearch of the Vast Heaven, the Memorial-Presenting Youth;
Eight Heavens of the East, Eight Heavens of the South, Eight Heavens of the West, Eight Heavens of the North.
The Gate of Change:
Generals Tang, Ge, and Zhou; the Communicating Perfected Envoys lead the way, as Perfected Zhang receives the memorial, and the Memorial Youth presents the document.
Marshal Tianpeng the Great, Marshal Tianyou the Great, Perfected Lord of Protective Virtue and Numinous Response, and Perfected Lord of Numinous Might and Protective Sagacity.
Heavenly Kings of the East, South, West, and North.

Purple Tenuity Enclosure:
Great Thearch of the Heavenly August, Purple Tenuity Thearch Lord;
Lords of the Seven Stars of the Northern Dipper;
Thearch Lord of the Great Yang, Thearch Lord of the Great Yin, Star Lords of Wood Virtue, Fire Virtue, Metal Virtue, Water Virtue, Earth Virtue, Rāhu, Ketu, Purple Qi, and Comet;
Star Lords of the Seven Mansions of the East, Seven Mansions of the South, Seven Mansions of the West, and Seven Mansions of the North.

Six Palaces of Fengdu:
Palace of Yin’s Utter Extinction, Palace of Grand Slaughter and Solemn Affairs, Palace of Bright Dawn and Enduring Offenses, Palace of Serene Illumination and Sinister Darkness, Palace of the Sevenfold Transgressions of the Ancestral Numen, Palace of Daring Governance and Repeated Offenses.

Diagram of the Three Powers’ Fixed Positions:
Above the Three Clarities Heaven lie the Ten Heavens of the Void August, wherein dwell the Void August Primordial Elders, Void August Primordial Lords, Void August Primordial Thearchs, Void August Primordial Venerables, and the Celestial Perfected Nine August Ones.

Three Heavens of the Void August:
First revolution: red; second: yellow; third: white; fourth: azure;
Fifth: black; sixth: red; seventh: azure; eighth: white; ninth: yellow.
The Heavenly Venerable’s head is azure, the sash behind is the same.
Void August Primordial Venerable,
Void August Primordial Elders.
chunks.overlap_context:
ders Lord; Grotto Clarity Lesser Existence Jade Perfected Myriad Florescence Master of Charts Jade Lord; Supreme Unity Supreme Origin Prohibition Lord; Supreme Yang Ninefold Black Jade Worthies Primordial Lord; Supreme Perfected Capital Ninefold Black Venerable Master of Immortals; Western Origin Turtle Mountain Ninefold Numinous Perfected Immortal Mother Azure-Golden Elixir August Lord.

The Eight Trigrams Descend in Darkness
The Dao speaks: Prior to the Supreme Unity, its form was spontaneous.
